content.detailedDescription: The object was first sign as a large hovering white ball in the sky, the white had a bluish tint to it. the light faded, flashed and began to move to the east. stopped hovered and light grew very bright and large again. then faded, flashing, moved to the west stopped and white light grew again hovering.  the object looked to be close to sheridan or kokomo, indiana.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsing white light, golf ball size grew to bright white blue light basket ball size straight-line path hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out of my window while watching tv 

it was huge and close to my house.  soooo many lights

an airplane going really slow and really low

triangular. tilted back like it was gonna land?

freaked me out.

it sped off in the distance.
content.summary: 200 yards from my house.  huge.  went outside, and it was gone.  saw it in the distance sitting still.  sped se suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving nw along route 2a outside of westminster ma. i saw what i thought was a small, bright object emerge from a cloud. on first glance i thought i was looking at an aircraft. it was small and bright and appeared to have a chemtrail. however, as the object moved, the part that i thought to be the "chemtrail" moved with it, remaining consistent in size and shape and maving in tandem. for a split second the whole object glowed as brightly as the one end, then returned to its original configuration. it made me think of a transparent flashlight, except that the end giving off light did not produce a beam. my overall impression as regards size and distance was that the object was quite distant and definitely larger than a school bus.
content.summary: Object first appeared bright like reflection of sunlight on airplane, with apparent chem-trail. however, chem trail moved in tandem with bright object, shape and length remaining consistent. object was cylindrical, one end brighter than rest of object

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on us84.  noticed 3 lights in triangle formation   then fade away.  see pic 1.  then similar light moves from behind billboard to same vicinity.  see pic 2.  glowing very brightly.   glow cannot be sun reflection because sun is setting in the west.
content.summary: Driving west on us84

content.detailedDescription:
standing n  my balcony  12 floor,  was a bring unusual glowing red ball over lake ontario, of a red light going in and out o our vision. it was of an abnormal shape.   looked like a fire ball.   a 15 second interval of light.
 last only 3 minutes,
?Then just stopped glowing, and gone.

the video shows it moving from one space to another, fast.

the two shots are taken with different camera's
content.summary: Red pulsings stationary light, unusual,

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday august 12 ,2014 at 05:45 my wife and i went to let the dog out. once outside we immediately saw this bright light approx. one mile from our house and just above the tree tops drifting along in a northerly direction. the light was very bright in the center of the object with a white flashing light out on each side. there were no colored lights at all just white. the large center light was round and approx. 1/3 the distance from outer lights;i would estimate around 30 feet or so. the objects shape could not be seen. it was black. no other lights were seen. from where we were i would say the object was approx. 100 feet wide between the outer white lights maybe more. there was no noise at all it was perfectly quiet just drifting along. we observed it for less than 2 min. as it continued its northerly direction. it went over the trees where we could no longer see it. we have a lot of airplanes fly over our area and at times several military jets (none lately)so we know the difference between what we saw and commercial and private aircraft. this was not one of them. this was not landing lights or lights under such aircraft. there was no way a person could not notice this object. it was not light out yet. i can not say how high the object was flying but it was low.
content.summary: Airplane like but silent, drifting along, approx 1 mile away, one white flashing light on each side, bright center round area 1/3 the width from outer end lights, no visible figure of object, just floated out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I usually stay awake late since am on holidays. so it was 3 am and i was observing the skies but i didnt notice until like 15 mints have passed while i was watching the stars i noticed that there is a big round light far away in the horizon where i can see it stationary on the top of the mountain. at first it looks like a normal light but i brought my camera to zoom to see if there is any details. 

after i brought my  digital camera sony 12 megapixels i zoomed the maximum to find that its a huge light and its on top floating over the mountain its impossible to be a a building since there is nothing at all. if i can guess its at least 30 meter in height standing still. and the mountain is about 2 km far from my place.

from the pictures i have taken i can clearly see that its on the sky. i stayed there at least 2 hours and still it didnt go. i came back the next night and there was nothing.
content.summary: Huge round light

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my car in the grocery store parking lot
talking on my phone around 8:15 on september 2, 2014
when i observe a large glowing orange sphere type object
coming over the trees.
i was yelling what the hell is that into the phone?
i had a fear that something would crash to the ground and
i was afraid i may be in danger- it veered slightly to the left
and higher in the sky on a diagnal course. 
i then got out of my car and watched it glow by
it seemed to be glowing/pulsating- it traveled like a small
plane gliding almost- and i watched it till it was out of sight.
no idea what is it was- never saw anything like that
almost doesnt even seem possible i saw it.
content.summary: Orange sphere

content.detailedDescription:
It was a very hot day, so i was frequently going outside to cool off as it was cooler outside than in. every time i would go out i would gaze at the stars as it was a beautiful clear night at the time. around 9:30 pm i went outside, while looking around the sky i noticed several redish orangish pale lights northeast of my direction. initially i thought it was a plane but i quickly realized that it wasn't making any noise, it was too low for a normal plane and it wasn't moving. there was a definite shape to it and i believe these lights were attached to the object and weren't independent of each other. i think it might have been a triangle similar to the one i observed in this same area a few months ago with different colored lights, however i'm not positive on the exact shape due to the distance and angle i was from the object. the lights seemed to pulsate simultaneously with eachother. i only got to observe the object for about a minute and then it just faded out and never reappeared.

i see planes here at night often and i am confident this was not a plane or any conventional aircraft for that mater. ufo reports in this area are common place, they are just largely under-reported to mufon. talk to just about anyone around here and they probably have a story. this marks my second sighting this year.
content.summary: Hovering reddish orange lights in a definite shape, possibly a triangle

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On august 3rd, 2014,at 9:54 pm, witness observed a shiny chrome like craft cross the sky above tree level, for 15 minutes. it appeared to be as large as a commercial aircraft, made no noise and moved in a straight path sw to ne. previously, on may 19,at 4:15 am, for 15 mins, witness observed a similar craft moving across the sky at a lower altitude.  no sound and no lights were observed. on the night of the 3rd, a small thunder storm was brewing toward the north.
witness lives 20 miles west of winston-salem. there is a national guard air base near salisbury.
content.summary: Witness for the second time, saw a chrome shiney craft fly by late at night

content.detailedDescription: The truth!!!!! i have had an ongoing relationship with different type of craft visitation.  and can positively identify 3 different types of craft and their stranger than you thought but ultimately peaceful agenda. i have had atleast 4 significant visits first in 1967? a craft never described before in shape and way of movement, 2nd 1980 sighting(with witness)strange craft with light panel on pivoting arms that move from facing the panel forward to downward. 3rd 1982 visit(this visit is connected with having found a short while before amazing physical natural phenomena communication in physical form i have photos of this phenomena and the phenomena exists and can be viewed today(3crafts this time hovering after following me home with light emiting from their cockpits but no visible occupants inside and then they moved off slowly west with one or another returning 25 or 30 min.S later(same pivoting panel of lights) witnessed by passing car that abruptly slowed down because it to saw the craft too. 4th visit 1992 or 93 early nov.( another disc craft sighted with 1 other witness who before the sighting stated twice "i wonder if she's got an engine for my space ship?" after coming out of a narcoleptic(sleep disorder) trance  the disc shaped underside lit up with blue flame in a circle just like a on a gas range stove from the bottom. then the whole bottom of craft glowed blue and craft trimmed to n.E.Upward direction and shot off like a shooting star. the next day or 2 after a detroit t.V.News caster said russia released report today about a saucer craft landing in a park featuring alien and a robot seen on a ramp from the craft. after 40 years of research and study of the phenomena and other e.T. history i have identified what they are and what their angelic agenda is.  this is no lie please get off your duffs and take me seriously!!!!!  i now have found more new phenomena it is absolutly amazing !!!! and it is again proof of contact!!!!!!! it is the highest caliber of encounter and intervention that will ever be known to modern man.  i have contacted seti, nassa jet propulsion lab, mi and canadian mufon, churches and more and i am disgusted with this country and the gov. coverups and i'm sick of being treated like s**t and ignored for my hard work in religious and scientific research pertaining to e.T.S all these posers are run away trains with know real focus  and are destined to be shamed  the eye of ra is well !!!!!Roswell full eyeing saw us hers.     the e.T.S are indeed gods and peaceful monitoring angels they prefer to just study us evolving children but now because the earth and gods other life is in dire danger due to pollution over population and extremely pore leadership in nearly all fields  you are going to get a biblical type of intervention sorry its for your own good so you don't totally disgrace your selfs in front of the land lords any more than you already have and so we as an earth family can better preserve a healthy future for humans and all the other now dearer to god life forms than us the decadent destructive ignorant humans who are suffering as well.    we/they/us come in peace    i have proof of contact if someone assists me the world will soon know more than they did and be and live smarter for it
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Craft followed me home then saw 3 craft moved west one returned huge with large panel of lights  fucused on me

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my evening walk and saw a low-bright light on the horizon. it appeared to reach a set elevation (5000ft?) and hoovered. at first i thought it was a typical airplane/helicopter with it's light pattern. after about 1:52min into the video it does a strobe like pattern with it's lights briefly, then it continues to hoover. i continued filming until it appeared to fly away towards the north.
content.summary: Saw hoovering pulsating light. it went into a pulse pattern not familiar with.

content.detailedDescription: Very large ears, small nose, small eyes, long fingers, long necks, normal skin color, large ears.Looks a lot like us.  said they are here because they need fat and they need to store it.  said that the world as we know it is going to change drastically very soon.   told me not to tell anyone.  put probes on my head and the probes left marks. i fainted. very scary.  why would they tell me.  said there are a lot of hybrids everywhere. there was green medicine on them. they said, "the perishment of you will attract attention but you will be disregarded"  i asked why me?  my wife was beside me in bed.  they told me she could not hear them and they held me down so i couldn't wake her.  they are very strong. i am terrified.  they told me not to tell anyone.  i told my wife and my best friend. my wife sees the scars on my head where the probes were placed.  my friend is reporting this for me.  i am too scared.  did not see the ufo.  i am reporting this for my friend.  he is terrified they will come back and kill him if he talks.
content.summary: Abduction
content.locationName: Lake of Pines East Texas , Texas

content.detailedDescription:
Monday, september 1, 2014 at 9:30 pm (central daylight saving),i was setting up my telescope on our deck when i, my wife and a friend saw two orange/red lights travelling nw to se at a high rate of speed 

they were moving in a straight line one in front of the other on separate parallel courses and then one of them accelerated, passed the other like it was standing still and then accelerated again and vanished while the other maintained the same rate of speed until out of sight.

then three more appeared from the same direction and travelled across the sky until out of sight. all of them were completely silent.

flew like nothing i've ever seen before, silent and very fast, freaked me out
content.summary: Bright red/orange lights appeared and travelled across the sky almost directly above us

content.detailedDescription: I was in the school and suddenly the light start fluctuating i ran through my class room to see why it is being happening but there was too much clouds in the sky. so that i cant see why this is happening ,then i go to my principals cabin to ask that is there is any electricity problem he said no,then i am shocked and then i went back to school playground to see is there is something in the sky but i could not see anything because of clouds.
content.summary: I was in the school and suddenly the light start fluctuating i ran through my class room to see why it is being happening but there was too much clouds in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I observed the object for around three minutes it made aeronautical maneuvers that i had not seen before it appeared to hover the object was triangular black yet reflective was able to change directions extremely fast it all happened pretty fast there appeared to be possibly a light or window on the top of the craft and then it headed north at an extreme rate of speed faster than anything i have ever seen
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object appeared reflective yet black possibly changing colors altered speeds above supersonic did not make sounds

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting looking toward the south and saw these 4 blue lights floating in the clouds for half a minute before darting and dissappearing thru the clouds at an extremely fast speed headed north
content.summary: Turquoise blue 4 lights hovered and darted from south headed north

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of sept. 2 ,2014 at approx. 11:10 pm i took my dogs out. i live in a rural area and noticed a heavy fog had settled in.  to the northeast i noticed a red light low on the horizon in which i thought to be a small airplane.  as a commercial pilot i hoped he didn't have to deal with this fog where he's going. then as i looked at this red light i realized there were no other nav lights or strobes and the red was constant. i was still convinced this was a small plane and maybe the pilot hadn't turned on the nav or strobe lights for some reason.
it appeared close enough that i should have heard an engine considering it was quite in my surroundings, but it was silent. at this time things got strange, an angular row of amber lights appeared below the red light to the right and the left making a triangular shape.  i quickly thought that if the mist in the air from the fog would refract the light it would make an x shape, not the shape i was seeing. ( i could be wrong). as i took my eyes off the object to get my wife, i looked back and it was gone. not a light of any kind where it had been.  i scanned the sky, nothing but stars.
content.summary: Witnessed a single red light, thought to be an airplane but then additional light appeard to form a triangle light shape below red light

content.detailedDescription:
Mi historia... multiples avistamientos desde hace aproximadamente un año todo empezo con extraños camvios en mi percepcion humana sensaciones de estar observada compre un telescopio unos prismaticos y obseve el cielo cada noche.  la zona dond yo vivo se ven movimientos en el cielo a diario . no tengo ningun tipo de desorden mental ni nada parecido solo soy una aficionada que tiene la gran fortuna de ver cosas que son maravillosas.. mi manera de pensar es que solo tienes que observar con tranquilidad y sin prisas busca un punto en el que estes tranquilo y comodo y dedicate a observar de noche el cielo. yo e visto esferas de color como estrellas orvitar en treyectorias distintas camvios repentinos de direccion, de color, en muxisimas ocasiones, aveces me da respeto , miedo y en otras siento tranquilidad sosiego ..
pero la ultima experiencia que tuve ayer fue a plena luz del dia pude observar a una entidad en forma de avion pero sin alas eso fue lo que me llamo la atencion y para mi sorpresa fue que estuvo presente de mi durante 30 min o mas era como si supiera que yo estava ahy mirando dos testigos vieron parte del evento la primera fue una señora que hizo caso a mis indicaciones de mirar el cielo y la segunda un chico en otro punto distinto al que yo me dirijia siguiendo al ovni( hermanos para mi entender) solo decir que me siento afortunada por tener la gran suerte de ver lo que otras personas no quieren, no me importa que digan d mi no me importa que piensen yo se quien soy y como soy lo que vi y veo es real existe. tengo pruevas que avalan mi testimonio. gracias por creer en mi saludos desd españa
content.summary: Lo segui 30 min suvia y vajaba camviava de color blanco y naranja iva y benia  parecia que supiera de mi fogonazo d luz avistamientos frecuentes

content.detailedDescription: I was checking daily weather updates as i do most mornings and hoping for some rain in the forecast. weather channel showed no rain in the ten day forecast for my area in northern ca so i turned to an application called living earth. it is a world map with near real time cloud and weather views around the world. i sometimes watch pacific cloud and weather patterns in hopes of predicting weather for the ca pacific coast further out than 10 days. this morning i observed in the living earth map an extremely large and lengthy contrail extending from western africa to australia, in a perfect straight line. the contrails were several hundred miles wide with 5 distinguishable trails reaching halfway around the world. at first i attributed this event as a glitch or application flaw. but as i studied the contrails further i could clearly see they were cloud like moisture or exhaust formations and appeared dissipating in some areas over the ocean.
content.summary: Extremely large jet contrail. hundreds of miles wide, thousands of miles long.

content.detailedDescription:
First time i've seen it was when a red light appeared in the sky hovering i think it was changing shapes because i seen a white light started growing.

movements= hover sliding left right 

after it started to decend building level at night it moved so fast back and forth like they never seen life before they started to beam a front light to scan or identify people i'm sure someone had to see it.

after
it start leaving then can back the left again 

after 
i looked up for anything else and seen a total different object this one seem similar to the photos i've seen in google 4 lights on 1 object black.

i can't take a image of it because of my windows it had built in screen's and it was like 50-100ft from my building. when i went to pick up my nexus 7 to take an image in a instant it was gone.

after and last
bright bright very bright light was move from the same direction as the airport but i thought it was plane until it stopped 

and started floating up. i have proof on that with an image
content.summary: Light beaming on the buildings

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and i went outside to roll the windows up on vehicle. on my way back to the house i noticed white, red and green lights in a diamond shaped pattern to the west just above the tree line at about 11:06 pm. it hovered for about 20 mins then drifted east then took off to the west. i took photos and video of the lights with my phone but the dust to dawn light kept the phone camera from picking up the lights. i felt somewhat excited to see something that strange in my neck of the woods i thought it looked like a fat blimp with lights on 4 sides because it made no noise and it hovered with out moving. a plane passed over the light at a greater altitude and the lights didn't move as the plane passed. i never felt frightened or threatened at anytime while observing the lights.
content.summary: Saw diamond shape lights hovering over tree tops over a mile away for twenty minutes.. object drifted east then left to the west.

content.detailedDescription:
In southeast eugene  09/02/2014 -21:12

looking west at ursa major i noticed a triangle of stars maybe 2 degrees below ursa and a few degrees south.  it was partly cloudy but i had clear sky for this event. 

 after looking at the stars for several seconds i started to return my gaze back to the dipper. simultaneously one of the three stars squirted straight north at a high speed, a second later, the star's brightness dimmed to almost nothing as the star almost came to a stop.  a flash appeared, looking like a lighthouse beacon as it rotated from west to east. it momentarily brightened the sky around the star. there was an incandescent trail which followed the same path as the star which disappeared just as quickly as it appeared. 

the flash dimmed, the star reappeared as originally seen, squirted (pulsed) again along the same transit for a roughly a second or two, dimmed again, almost disappearing while almost stopping again.  the brilliant flash reoccured with the same intensity of light around the star.  after the light diminished the star regained its former visibility  and streaked out of sight to the north.  the event had covered half of the western sky in 2-4 seconds.

the squirt, or pulse, was a movement similar to what a squid would do.

i looked back to the area of the original triangle  to the left (south) of the big dipper to find that the other two stars had disappeared.  i didn't see them move, they were just gone!
content.summary: One of three stars below of ursa major squirted north, slowed, dimmed then flashed a bright light in a circle light  aka a light house,  then repeated the sequence exactly once more then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Went out side to have a smoke befor bed. i was looking at the stars , the sky was clear . i saw a small flash of light .  straight obove slightly to the east.It was bright.I was trying to figure what i just witnesed, quazar,satalight, exploiding... then it went off again this time as the flash dimed , a star shape and brightness and came out of the flash. ok now i thought i was witnessing a hunk of space junk comming out of the sky and going to hit someware .. but it turned to the right or west. it traveld
at five to six times the speed of a satalight.. 0 to aroud 100,000 mph.
i wonder to this day did i see a ufo come out of a worm hole? the first flash the worm hole opend second flash ufo came through then worm hole closed... when the object went straight or south and turned to the right or west i did see a curve in the turn.
not a sharp turn..

  thank you, [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Ufo came out of flash of light

content.detailedDescription: At 10:31 pm five of us saw something like a fireball or burning-up space junk fly very slowly over the denver area from the south part of the sky, directly overhead, continuing until it disappeared behind houses to the nne. two original witnesses were in the back yard getting exercise when they first noticed the light. they ran inside from the back yard and got 3 more witnesses to go out front of the house where we watched it continue across the sky. the white object pulsed brightly several times when straight overhead, at roughly 2 seconds intervals. it had a trail at all times it was visible, about 3 or 4 degrees in length (6 to 8 times the width of the moon). toward the end of its flight it appeared to break into two pieces. having the witnesses individually reenact the sighting pinned the timing down to 50 to 55 seconds. i was in the basement and because it took me 15 or more seconds longer to get notified i saw it the least of anyone, but was still able to see a dim rusty trail drift down towards the north-north-east horizon and slowly disappear behind the roof line of a house across the street, probably 5 degrees above the horizon. its angular velocity appeared faster than an airplane or the iss (we watch that often), but much slower than any fireball we've ever seen. at its brightest its pulses might have been as bright as the full moon according to the original two witnesses.
content.summary: Pulsating slow bright object flew overhead nearly horizon to horizon

content.detailedDescription: Went out for a ciggarette. was looking at the news on my phone when my phone lost all service. i looked up and for about ten seconds saw a triangular aircraft probably of an altitude of 300 to 4oo feet. made no noise. had flashing white lights on what appeared to be wings. red and bluish green lights were underneath. the thing that startled me was i heard nothing, no sound as it approached or it past. i thought it may have been a plane when i first saw it but it is very cloudy tonight and the craft was lower than any plane of that size i have seen at that altitude.I don't think i would have noticed it unless my phone got screwed up. was moving in a straight path and constant speed as it was lost from sight behind trees. there was a strange blue flash that appeared to be like a camera flash a few seconds before i noticed my phone wasn't working and i happened to see the object. it startled me quite a bit and strangely my dogs began barking as i was outside, immediately as i saw the craft. the dogs were inside the house. one of my dogs is deaf and she barked as well (don't know why, she never does).
content.summary: Slow moving, low flying ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was on my break at a gas station at the corner of 14th street and spring street, looking up into the sky towards the north.  bright yellow light suddenly appeared in the direction i was looking, just above the trees, about a half or mile away. then i grabbed my camcorder started taping and object started moving.  at first it was hovering in same spot for about 5 minutes then it started moving, downward, when i started recording.  at first i thought it was the reflection on a plane but it didn't move.  i look at planes all the time since i work around the airport.  it was not a plane, not a blimp, or a helicopter.  i finally lost sight of it as it desended and was obscured by the trees.
content.summary: Bright yellow light appeared suddenly in sky, hovered and then started moving slowly

content.detailedDescription: You need to contact me for more info.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was a plane at first but quickly realized its was a ufo, it was sometimes fast, sometimes slow. but it was hovering over the house like if it was scanning or looking for something!

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv and had just stood up to turn it off, when i heard a sudden sound like a boom with a light flash.

i then looked out the window to see silent translucent dark, orb blue green light-emitting object with dark center making arc towards mountains in distance over which it apparently descended and disappeared.

i thought it was a green fireball, as i had seen one 2 years ago in very similar conditions, at the same time of night.

the object that i saw was was not as luminous as the other one i had seen 2 and 1/2 years ago.

that object was a bright green, while this was more towards a dull translucent blue-green with what seemed to be a dark center. 

the dark center really fascinated me and made me realize that this was not a meteor.

i was quite shocked, as i see meteors frequently here at high altitude, but this was at very low altitude, 1-2000 feet at most and it was almost gliding as if an airplane coming in for a landing... but of course... it was anything but.

then it was gone. 

that simple. i was shocked and yelled out, and my wife woke up.
content.summary: Heard sudden sound like a boom with a light flash, looked out the window to see silent translucent dark, orb blue green light-emitting object with dark center making arc towards mountains in distance over which it apparently descended and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 10:25 pm, saw two orange and red flashing lights moving in tandem, heading northeast from southwest, they stopped, hovered, darted, and one vanished 10 seconds prior to other vanishing.
content.summary: Saw two lights heading due northeast from southwest, hovered, raised altitude.
